activity.instructions: Match the questions with the responses. Drag the first part to the correct response.

audio.oae-label: audio file name (optional). Please include the file extension (.mp3)

matches.oae-label: The items can be either text, graphic, or audio. Please include the file extension if either a graphic file or an audio file (This is how the engine will determine that the file name is not text, but a file)

match.leftitem: A: Can I get a magazine there?
match.rightitem: B: No, they sell only books.

match.leftitem: A: Do you like that book?
match.rightitem: B: No. Thrillers just aren't my thing.

match.leftitem: A: Have you read his new book?
match.rightitem: B: No, I haven't read it yet.

match.leftitem: A: When do you usually read?
match.rightitem: B: I curl up with a book after work.

match.leftitem: A: Can I borrow your book?
match.rightitem: B: I'd be glad to lend it to you.
